name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.3.2
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug created on commit #4368a7f. 
* Dispose AWT windows when we are done with them.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.3.1
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug that was causing not updating the features after loading a classifier.
* Fix bug when creating features of a slice with traces before training after loading a classifier.

Major changes:
* Fix bug when loading models from file (caused in previous version when setting the Hessian mode). Issue #67.
* New functionality to change the color associated to a class by right-clicking in the corresponding "Add to class" button.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.35
body:
Major changes:
* Fix Hessian eigenvalue calculation in FeatureStack.
* Fix bug from issue #63.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.24
body:
Major changes:
* Prevent error messages when loading Color Clustering plugin.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.33
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug when applying classifier using tiles.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.32
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug when using Gabor features.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.31
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug on GUI when using large images.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.30
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug on macro calls to match exactly the feature names.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.27
body:
Major changes:
* Make slice classification faster.
* New methods to add training data from label images.
* New utility methods to calculate confusion matrix between label images.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.26
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug in the hyperstack formed when creating a probability map from macro (reported by Arturo Ibáñez).

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.25
body:
Major changes:
* Add method to apply a classifier on an image using tiles.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.24
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug that allowed using GUI while saving a classifier to file.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.23
body:
Major changes:
  * Fix bug on the calculation of ImageScience features with anisotropic voxel size.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.22
body:
Major changes:
* Fix sigmas in 3D features so they are in voxel units and are adjusted based on the image calibration.
* Fix bug in 3D structure feature to store middle and smallest eigenvalues correctly.
Special thanks to James Lefevre who pointed out the bugs!

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.21
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug when using class names without samples.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.20
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug that was preventing the settings dialog to be displayed after loading a 3D classifier.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.19
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug when loading a classifier trained on features that did not use a sigma.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.18
body:
Major changes:
* Allow adding 3D samples programmatically from binary labels.
* Make sure label output is 8-bit.
* Replace autoThreshold() calls by correct thresholding.

name: Trainable_Segmentation-3.2.17
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug when using a 3D classifier from script without the GUI.
* Set correctly probability map slice names in all methods.

name: Release v3.2.16
body:
Major changes:
* Make sure training threads are properly stopped in Weka.

name: Release v3.2.15
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug when converting images to 32-bit in headless mode.

name: Release v3.2.14
body:
Major changes:
* Improve error control when loading classifiers.
* Improve error message when loading ARFF.
* Make sure applyClassifier works with 3D features from script.

name: Release v3.2.13
body:
Major changes:
* Hide input image while using the plugin.
* Great speed up in ShapeRoi traces reading.

name: Release v3.2.11
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug when loading wrong ARFF file to prevent deadlock.

name: Release v3.2.8
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug when reading sigmas from models using Gabor features.
* Allow working with WekaSegmentation objects without training images.

name: Release v3.2.7
body:
Major changes:
* Fix bug on Hessian eigenvalues calculation (thanks to @maarzt).

name: Release v3.2.5
body:
Major changes:
- Fix bug reported by Curtis Rueden in Issue #22.

name: Release v3.2.4
body:
Major changes:
- Fix bug discovered by Stefan Helfrich that was causing an exception when loading 3d classifiers.

name: Release v3.2.3
body:
Major changes:
- Correct small bugs to use proper label images as output.
- Add constructor with default parameters to FeatureStackArray to use user-defined features in an easier way.
- Add static class in Weka_Segmentation (the plugin GUI class) to create a label image out of the user traces.
- Adapt methods to use label images with zero for undefined class pixels.

name: Release v3.2.2
body:
Major changes:
- Fix bug when saving several classification results (use correct LUT and image type).

name: Release v3.2.1
body:
Major changes:
- Fix bug when balancing classes from macro.
- Do not show membrane options in settings when working in 3D.

name: Release v3.2.0
body:
Major changes:
- Add 3D GUI compatibility, including new plugin.
- Use imglib2 for 3d DoG features.
- Update WEKA version to 3.9.0.
- Rename "homogenize" methods by more accepted "balance".
- Fix several bugs related to displaying results.

name: Release v3.1.2
body:
Major changes:
- Fix java version problem with release 3.1.1.
- Increase maximum number of classes to 100 (release 3.1.1).
- Add method to enable/disable a feature by name (release 3.1.1).
- Add library methods to add training instances from a label image (release 3.1.1).
- Much code cleanup by Mohamed Ezzat from DevFactory (release 3.1.1).

name: Release v3.1.0
body:
Major changes:
- Correct wrong method name for V_info thin metric.

name: Release v2.3.0
body:
Major changes:
- Fix bug on float number comparisons by using Float.compare()
- Speed up classification of new images by reusing a weka instance for each pixel.
- Include new metrics V_Rand (thin) and V_info (thin) as described in our Frontiers in Neuroanatomy paper.

name: Release v2.2.1
body:
Major changes:
- Fix bug to return result from macro when classified image exists.
- In the Entropy filter, convert to image to byte before calculating bins.

name: Release v2.2.0
body:
Major changes:
- Make ImageScience features optional, thanks to Curtis Rueden. This way we avoid license problems.
- Propagate calibration to result image, thanks to Jan Eglinger.
- Add public methods to calculate disagreements based on Rand or Information theoretic scores

name: Release v2.1.8
body: - Fix bug reported by Martin Höhne to be able to calculate the result image from a macro after having loaded a classifier.

name: Release v2.1.7
body:
Major changes:
- Clean RandError metric class to clearly separate the standard Rand index/error calculation from the foreground-restricted version that is used in the 2D EM segmentation challenge (http://brainiac2.mit.edu/isbi_challenge/).
- In the GUI, fix bug that was causing disabled buttons after an error in Plot results (pointed out by Mark Hiner).
- In the GUI, allow creating result after loading a classifier (also suggested by Mark Hiner).
- Add a method to load a classifier from an input stream (by Patrice Freydiere).

name: Release v2.1.6
body:
Major changes:
- Fix fatal bug introduced in the previous release in the selection of the index of the slice with traces.

name: Release v2.1.5
body:
Major changes:
- Fix bug introduced in previous attempt to avoid setting a FeatureStack as reference of a FeatureStackArray. Now, when arbitrary FeatureStack objects are assigned to the FeatureStackArray, the reference index must be specify using the public method "setReference".

name: Release v.2.1.3
body:
Major changes:
- Fix bug that was causing exception when using a 3d image as input when no traces where set in the first slice.
- Set slice in the GUI so it is the same as the one selected in the input image.

name: Release v2.1.2
body:
Major changes:
- Fix bug concerning backslashes in paths using Windows.
- Show 8-bit color results from macro when applying classifier.
- Update buttons enabled when loading classifier from macro.
